title: Brown Sugar & Banana Oatmeal
directions: Over medium heat in a saucepan, bring the milk to a low boil. Watch & stir this very often. Milk burns easy!
Once it comes to a low boil pour in the Quick Oats. Stirring constantly, cook for 1-2 minutes. It will start to thicken.
Take off heat and cover with lid. Let sit for 3-5 minutes.
Add in brown sugar, honey, bananas, and nuts (if desired) and stir together.
